title: Game keeps crashing
body: So after patch 7.5 I have started to disconnect randomly, in game, for no reason. It happens almost every 5 minutes and takes 30 seconds to reconnect. This has resulted in a number or ranked games being lost. Is there a way to fix this? Cause it has never done this before patch 7.5 came out and nothing on my computer or network has changed as far as I know.

replies.body:
It looks like there might be some type of connection issue that's preventing you from staying in the game. This could be caused by any number of factors such as firewall settings or something else. Let's try some of these connection troubleshooting steps [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

If this doesn't help, just let me know and we'll go from there ^_^!
